price: 16. Y no creamos los cielos y la tierra y cuanto existe en ellos como mero juego.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqnā al-samāa wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā lāʿibīna
